article: I was 18 years old when Tim and I began to date. _ and quiet. I'd met his parents once before but hadn't ventured to say more than Hello . This particular evening we were taking them out to dinner for their anniversary and I wanted to make a good _ on them. Tim and his parents had arrived to pick me up. I _ out of my home as soon as possible. My good impression began with on time . I sat in the backseat _ watching his father's eyes glancing into the rearview mirror to _ me. They had already decided on their favorite _ and that was fine with me, the _ lighting would hide the rising flush in my cheeks, and if anyone noticed, I could _ it on the peppers. With _ table manners I managed to survive halfway through dinner. _ in the midst of conversation I _ for my iced tea, raised the glass to my _ and very quickly discovered I had picked up the _ glass. I quickly _ the glass and set it back but it was too _ I had burnt my eyebrows, and curl over my forehead! I looked up slowly, _ no one had seen me, but each face stared at me in _ silence. Excusing myself, I ran to the restroom. Soon afterwards, Tim's mother arrived. Everything will be just fine, she said _ . Tim and I eventually got _ . We had a small ceremony afterwards held at the restaurant where this _ occurred. This time, however, I didn't drink any candles.
